channel.title: Terminal on André Brandão
channel.description: Recent content in Terminal on André Brandão

item.title: Terminal Setup with Zsh + Tmux + Dracula Theme
item.description: I have just recently improved my terminal setup after learning how to use Tmux. It gave me a way to move faster between projects and even kept my session saved after machine shutdowns. My goal here is to help you configure a environment that will be both beautiful and functional. Let’s get to it. What we will set up Guake: top-down terminal that can be instantaneously opened with a keystroke.
